DOC.brief_summary: The study design assess method use clinical research .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate Methods To Evaluate Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Lower back pain Male female generally good health , 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) Pregnant lactate Subject evidence history radiculopathy , i.e . sciatica extend knee ( numbness , tingle , shoot pain ) , neurologic deficit ( abnormal straight leg raise test , patellar reflex , and/or bowel bladder function ) ; Subject history previous back surgery ; Subject back pain result traumatic injury involve physical evidence bruising , swell , inflammation abdomen low back area occur less 48 hour prior enrollment Has take investigational drug within past 30 day prior enter study , currently enrol another investigational study Is member relative study site staff , CRO Sponsor organization directly involve study household member relative participate concurrently previously study Has previously enrol study
